meanings.definition: A mammal of the horse family, including horses, asses, and zebras.
meanings.sent1: The equid galloped gracefully across the field.
meanings.sent2: I saw an equid at the farm yesterday.
meanings.sent3: Why did the equid bring a saddle to the party?
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like that of a wild equid racing towards freedom.
meanings.sent5: The children were thrilled to ride the equid at the petting zoo.

meanings.definition: Resembling or related to a horse or other member of the horse family.
meanings.sent1: The equid markings on the cat made it look unique.
meanings.sent2: The toy had an equid design on its sides.
meanings.sent3: The equid pattern on the shirt was quite fashionable.
meanings.sent4: Her swift movements were as graceful as an equid in motion.
meanings.sent5: The equid charm on her bracelet reminded her of her love for horses.
